Name: Legendary Trio
Description: Catch each of the three legendary Kanto birds.

Name: Foreign Specimen
Description: Obtain a legendary Pokemon that is not native to Kanto

Name: Distanced Trainer
Description: Leave a Pokemon in the daycare

Name: Pokemon Breeder
Description: Obtain an egg from the Pokemon Daycare

Name: Geologist
Description: Evolve a Pokemon using an evolution stone

Name: Finisher
Description: Obtain all fully evolved starters from each region

Name: Companion
Description: Achieve max happiness with one of your Pokemon

Name: Tutor User
Description: Learn a move from a move tutor

Name: Tactician I
Description: Use a super effective move in battle

Name: Tactician II
Description: Use 50 super effective moves in battle

Name: Tactician III
Description: Use 100 super effective moves in battle

Name: Tactician IV
Description: Use 250 super effective moves in battle

Name: Tactical Mastermind
Description: Use 500 super effective moves in battle

Name: Play to Strengths I
Description: Use a move with Same Type Attack Bonus in battle

Name: Play to Strengths II
Description: Use 50 moves with Same Type Attack Bonus in battle

Name: Play to Strengths III
Description: Use 100 moves with Same Type Attack Bonus in battle

Name: Play to Strengths IV
Description: Use 250 moves with Same Type Attack Bonus in battle

Name: Play to Strengths V
Description: Use 500 moves with Same Type Attack Bonus in battle

Name: Play to Strengths VI
Description: Use 1000 moves with Same Type Attack Bonus in battle

Name: Badge Collector
Description: Collect all 8 Kanto gym badges by defeating gym leaders in battle.

Name: Cruisin' for a Bruisin'
Description: Win all battles on the S.S. Anne

Name: Cerulean Champ
Description: Win the Cerulean City Pokemon Tournament

Name: Vermillion Champ
Description: Win the Vermillion City Pokemon Tournament

Name: Celadon Champ
Description: Win the Celadon City Pokemon Tournament

Name: Rival
Description: Defeat Rival Gary in battle 5 times

Name: Vigilante I
Description: Defeat a Team Rocket Grunt in battle

Name: Vigilante II
Description: Defeat 20 Team Rocket Grunts in battle

Name: Vigilante III
Description: Defeat 50 Team Rocket Grunts in battle

Name: Dragon Slayer
Description: Defeat Kanto Champion Lance in a battle

Name: Steven
Description: Defeat Hoenn Champion Steven in a battle

Name: Wallace
Description: Defeat Hoenn Champion Wallace in a battle

Name: Cynthia
Description: Defeat Sinnoh Champion Cynthia in a battle
